scripts.simulate-dev-merge: CURRENT_BRANCH=$(git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD) && MERGE_BRANCH=develop && npm run simulateMerge
scripts.simulate-merge: CURRENT_BRANCH=$(git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD) && MERGE_BRANCH=master && npm run simulateMerge
scripts.simulateMerge: git checkout $CURRENT_BRANCH && npm run simulate-commit && git checkout $MERGE_BRANCH && git merge $CURRENT_BRANCH  && git push && git checkout $CURRENT_BRANCH
